channel.title: Skillcapes
channel.description: I got my skills lvl up to120 for each but now i have a problem....when i try and wear a skillcape it says i need 99 in that skill to wearit....any advice???

item.title: Skillcapes
item.dc:creator: @bxexnxnxextt bxexnxnxextt
item.description:
@bxexnxnxextt wrote:

i see the problem i just tested it lol…when you get to 100 of the stat u want (14391600) it auto matically goes up to 120 for some reason.

you cant get them if that. just put skillCapeReward(skill, palyerLevel[skill]);
in your level up process

Just take them out of your getcl

level requirment

item.title: Skillcapes
item.dc:creator: @Killer-99-pkz Killer-99-pkz
item.description:
@Killer-99-pkz wrote:

public void skillCapeReward(int skillId, int skillLvl) {
if (skillId == 0 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Attack
addItem(14073, 1);
addItem(14074, 1);
addItem(14075, 1);
}
if (skillId == 1 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Defence
addItem(14079, 1);
addItem(14080, 1);
addItem(14081, 1);
}
if (skillId == 2 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Strength
addItem(14076, 1);
addItem(14077, 1);
addItem(14078, 1);
}
if (skillId == 3 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Hitpoints
addItem(14094, 1);
addItem(14095, 1);
addItem(14096, 1);
}
if (skillId == 4 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Ranging
addItem(14082, 1);
addItem(14083, 1);
addItem(14084, 1);
}
if (skillId == 5 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Prayer
addItem(14085, 1);
addItem(14086, 1);
addItem(14087, 1);
}
if (skillId == 6 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Magic
addItem(14088, 1);
addItem(14089, 1);
addItem(14090, 1);
}
if (skillId == 7 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Cooking
addItem(14127, 1);
addItem(14128, 1);
addItem(14129, 1);
}
if (skillId == 8 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Woodcutting
addItem(14133, 1);
addItem(14134, 1);
addItem(14135, 1);
}
if (skillId == 9 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Fletching
addItem(14109, 1);
addItem(14110, 1);
addItem(14111, 1);
}
if (skillId == 10 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Fishing
addItem(14124, 1);
addItem(14125, 1);
addItem(14125, 1);
}
if (skillId == 11 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player firemaking
addItem(14130, 1);
addItem(14131, 1);
addItem(14132, 1);
}
if (skillId == 12 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Crafting
addItem(14106, 1);
addItem(14107, 1);
addItem(14108, 1);
}
if (skillId == 13 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Smithing
addItem(14121, 1);
addItem(14122, 1);
addItem(14123, 1);
}
if (skillId == 14 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Mining
addItem(14118, 1);
addItem(14119, 1);
addItem(14120, 1);
}
if (skillId == 15 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Herblore
addItem(14100, 1);
addItem(14101, 1);
addItem(14102, 1);
}
if (skillId == 16 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Agility
addItem(14097, 1);
addItem(14098, 1);
addItem(14099, 1);
}
if (skillId == 17 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Thieving
addItem(14103, 1);
addItem(14104, 1);
addItem(14105, 1);
}
if (skillId == 18 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Slayer
addItem(14112, 1);
addItem(14113, 1);
addItem(14114, 1);
}
if (skillId == 19 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Farming
addItem(14136, 1);
addItem(14137, 1);
addItem(14138, 1);
}
if (skillId == 20 && skillLvl == 99) {
// Player Runecraft
addItem(14091, 1);
addItem(14092, 1);
addItem(14093, 1);
}
sendMessage(“Congratulations! You Are Rewarded A Skill Cape”);
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2008, 01:07:30 PM[/size][hr]skillCapeReward(skill, playerLevel[skill]);
